name: Math Game (itch) (Cetus)
description: This game was programmed by Hussein Nabeel Ibrahim, 15 years old in the 9th grade at Al-harthiya Distinguished Secondary School. This is the second version of Math Game (V1.1) which contains three out of four math operations (Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication). The aim of this game is to encourage children to learn the principles of MATH in a competitive way.
